duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the development of new generations of DRAM memory as it transitions from the design stage to mass production.
Perform wafer and component level circuit debug and device characterization for improved operation and testability.
Conduct detailed DRAM analysis to improve end-user performance and reliability.
Assist with circuit simulation, failure analysis, and yield optimization.
Aid in Test program development at wafer, component, and module steps.

education_certification.credential: Pursuing a minimum of a Bachelor's degree in Electrical or Computer Engineering
